About Me

I have been working on some form of design for more than half of my life. I thoroughly enjoy projects that involve a creative mindset, and I’ve always been very interested in creating music and making sound, as well as shooting & directing video.

Mission

I love to create things. It's in my blood. I am constantly trying to make something that has a positive impact on others, and inspires them to go out and make something amazing.
